languages.text: "Ага, как же. Тряпки небось с верхних кварталов! А шавка? Гля, какая расписная! Такая мне самому пригодится." {n}Главарь делает шаг вперед. Наперерез ему шагает Глейто. Железные челюсти выбрируют от низкого рычания.{/n}

"Uh-huh, sure. I'll bet that nice dress of yours is from the upper quarters. And that dog? Ooh, so fancy-looking! I'd love one of those for myself." {n}The leader takes a step forward. Glaito moves to block his path. A low growl makes the hound's jaws vibrate.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ага, как же. Тряпки небось с верхних кварталов! А шавка? Гля, какая расписная! Такая мне самому пригодится." {n}Главарь делает шаг вперед. Наперерез ему шагает Глейто. Железные челюсти выбрируют от низкого рычания.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Uh-uh, sure. I'll bet that nice dress of yours is from the upper quarters. And the dog? So fancy-looking! I'd love one of those for myself." {n}The leader takes a step forward. Glaito moves to block his path. A low growl makes the cyber-mastiff's jaws vibrate.{/n}

"Uh-huh, sure. I'll bet that nice dress of yours is from the upper quarters. And that dog? Ooh, so fancy-looking! I'd love one of those for myself." {n}The leader takes a step forward. Glaito moves to block his path. A low growl makes the hound's jaws vibrate.{/n}

languages.text: “呵，可不是嘛！我敢说，你那条漂亮的裙子肯定是件值钱货。还有那条狗？哎哟，这可是条好狗！我也想弄这么一条来。”{n}土匪头子向前走了一步，但格雷托同样上前一步，拦住了他的去路。格雷托发出低沉的咆哮声，下颚颤动起来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh, sure. I'll bet that nice dress of yours is from the upper quarters. And that dog? Ooh, so fancy-looking! I'd love one of those for myself." {n}The leader takes a step forward. Glaito moves to block his path. A low growl makes the hound's jaws vibrate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “呵，可不是嘛！我敢说，你那条漂亮的裙子肯定是件值钱货。还有那条狗？哎哟，这可是条好狗！我也想弄这么一条来。”{n}土匪头子向前走了一步，但格雷托同样上前一步，拦住了他的去路。格雷托发出低沉的咆哮声，下颚颤动起来。{/n}

languages.text: 「ああ、そうかい。どうせそのきれいなドレスも上層区のもんなんだろ？それにその犬は何だ？おお、ずいぶんとおしゃれじゃないか！俺も一匹ほしいくらいだ」{n}リーダーは一歩前に出た。グライトがその前に立ちはだかる。唸り声とともに、犬の顎がわずかに震えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh, sure. I'll bet that nice dress of yours is from the upper quarters. And that dog? Ooh, so fancy-looking! I'd love one of those for myself." {n}The leader takes a step forward. Glaito moves to block his path. A low growl makes the hound's jaws vibrate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ああ、そうかい。どうせそのきれいなドレスも上層区のもんなんだろ？それにその犬は何だ？おお、ずいぶんとおしゃれじゃないか！俺も一匹ほしいくらいだ」{n}リーダーは一歩前に出た。グライトがその前に立ちはだかる。唸り声とともに、犬の顎がわずかに震えた。{/n}

languages.text: «Ya, claro. Seguro que ese vestido tan elegante es del barrio de los ricos. ¿Y ese chucho? ¡Ooh, qué sofisticado! Me encantaría tener uno así». {n}El líder da un paso al frente, pero Glaito se interpone en su camino con un gruñido gutural que hace vibrar toda su mandíbula.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh, sure. I'll bet that nice dress of yours is from the upper quarters. And that dog? Ooh, so fancy-looking! I'd love one of those for myself." {n}The leader takes a step forward. Glaito moves to block his path. A low growl makes the hound's jaws vibrate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Ya, claro. Seguro que ese vestido tan elegante es del barrio de los ricos. ¿Y ese chucho? ¡Ooh, qué sofisticado! Me encantaría tener uno así». {n}El líder da un paso al frente, pero Glaito se interpone en su camino con un gruñido gutural que hace vibrar toda su mandíbula.{/n}

languages.text: "Çok inandım. Güzelim elbisenin yukarı malı olduğuna bahse varım. Köpeğe gelince... Amma havalı bir şey! Benim de olsun isterdim." {n}Lider bir adım öne çıkıyor. Glaito, yolunu kesmek için hareketleniyor. Köpeğin çenesini titreten alçak bir hırlama duyuluyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh, sure. I'll bet that nice dress of yours is from the upper quarters. And that dog? Ooh, so fancy-looking! I'd love one of those for myself." {n}The leader takes a step forward. Glaito moves to block his path. A low growl makes the hound's jaws vibrate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Çok inandım. Güzelim elbisenin yukarı malı olduğuna bahse varım. Köpeğe gelince... Amma havalı bir şey! Benim de olsun isterdim." {n}Lider bir adım öne çıkıyor. Glaito, yolunu kesmek için hareketleniyor. Köpeğin çenesini titreten alçak bir hırlama duyuluyor.{/n}

languages.text: « C'est ça. Je parie que cette jolie robe que tu portes vient des beaux quartiers. Et ce chien ? Regardez-moi cette merveille ! J'adorerais en avoir un tout pareil. » {n}Le chef fait un pas vers vous, mais Glaito s'interpose tandis qu'un grognement sourd fait vibrer ses puissantes mâchoires.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Uh-huh, sure. I'll bet that nice dress of yours is from the upper quarters. And that dog? Ooh, so fancy-looking! I'd love one of those for myself." {n}The leader takes a step forward. Glaito moves to block his path. A low growl makes the hound's jaws vibrate.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « C'est ça. Je parie que cette jolie robe que tu portes vient des beaux quartiers. Et ce chien ? Regardez-moi cette merveille ! J'adorerais en avoir un tout pareil. » {n}Le chef fait un pas vers vous, mais Glaito s'interpose tandis qu'un grognement sourd fait vibrer ses puissantes mâchoires.{/n}

languages.text: "Uh-huh, sicher. Ich wette, dein hübsches Kleid kommt aus den oberen Vierteln. Und der Hund dort? Der sieht ja irre aus. So einen hätte ich auch gerne." {n} Der Anführer macht einen Schritt nach vorne. Glaito stellt sich ihm in den Weg. Ein tiefes Knurren lässt den Kiefer des Hundes vibrieren.{/n}
